nodes.text: Farwan & Glott was a company that manufactured podracers and were the original manufacturer of the podracer used by Neva Kee in the Boonta Eve Classic of 32 BBY. Following Kee's disappearance in the race, Coruscant Security Force police inspector Tan Divo speculated that Farwan & Glott was responsible and theorized that the company hired Aurra Sing to take out Kee so that they might acquire the secret podracer customizations that he refused to share.
